title: Mario Draghi - Wikipedia
snippet: He has been nicknamed Super Mario by some media, a nickname that was popularised during his time as president of the ECB, when he was credited by numerous sources as having played a key role in combatting the Eurozone crisis. After Draghi's term as ECB President ended in 2019, he initially returned to private life.

title: Mario Draghi | Biography, Prime Minister, & Facts | Britannica
snippet: Under Draghi the ECB adopted interventionist monetary policies that were aimed not just at calming the panic that had gripped the eurozone but at ensuring that Europeâ€™s economies would be better positioned to weather future crises.

title: Mario Draghi | CEPR
snippet: Mario Draghi is an Italian economist, central banker, and public servant with a distinguished career in international finance and policy. He served as President of the European Central Bank (ECB) from 2011 to 2019, where he played a pivotal role in navigating the Eurozone through the sovereign ...

title: Who Is Mario Draghi and Why Is He Important to Economics?
snippet: Moral suasion is not limited to the U.S. In 2012, European Central Bank (ECB) president Mario Draghi said the bank would do "whatever it takes" to preserve the euro, which served to underpin the beleaguered currency and led to its subsequent rebound.

title: Mario Draghi - European Central Bank
snippet: Get in TouchGet In Touch With Mario DraghiGet In Touch ... As president of the European Central Bank (ECB), Mario Draghi has presided over an era of disintegrating faith in EU, notable in the 2016 Brexit vote.
